mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TB_CALL100.CHG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS chgDt, TB_USED100.MODEL_NM AS modelNm, TB_USED100.USED_GDS_PRICE as usedGdsPrice FROM TB_CALL100 INNER JOIN TB_USED100 ON TB_CALL100.USED_GDS_NO = TB_USED100.USED_GDS_NO WHERE CALL_STS_CD=1;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(tb_odr110.ODR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS odrDt, tb_odr110.ODR_QTY AS odrQty, tb_odr110.AGREE_TEM AS agreeTem, tb_odr110.GDS_PRICE AS gdsPrice, tb_odr100.ODR_STS_GB_CD AS odrStsGbCd FROM tb_odr110 INNER JOIN tb_odr100 ON tb_odr110.ODR_NO = tb_odr100.ODR_NO;
